name: Melt The Ice King
description:
Melt The Ice King

You play as a mage who has entered the ice king’s cavern with the intention of bringing an end to his reign.  

This is a 2D side-on shooter boss fight game where you cast spells at the ice king to try and raise his temperature to his melting point. 

This game was made for the “My First Game Jam: Summer 2022”

The theme of the jam was “Heal”

Controls:
Move:   WASD
Jump:  Space 
Aim:  Mouse
Enter Ice Mage Mode:  Shift
